articles.title: Netherlands Announces Christmas "Lockdown" Over Omicron Scare - NDTV
articles.description: The Netherlands on Saturday announced a Christmas lockdown and London declared a "major incident" as Europe tries to rein in rising Covid-19 case numbers and the highly mutated Omicron strain takes hold.
articles.content:
Netherlands will go into lockdown over Christmas to try to stop an Omicron surge (File)

articles.title: Netherlands going back into lockdown as Europe tightens COVID-19 measures - CBC News
articles.description: Nations across Europe moved to reimpose tougher measures to stem a new wave of COVID-19 infections spurred by the highly transmissible Omicron variant, including a new nationwide lockdown introduced by the Dutch government.

articles.title: Omicron more likely to reinfect than Delta, no milder - study - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -     The risk of reinfection with the Omicron coronavirus variant is more than five times higher and it has shown no sign of being milder than Delta, a study showed, as cases soar across Europe and threaten year-end festivities.
